attributes.action: Stop the slow erosion of British ways and British culture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Multiculturalism broughtin by this Labour Govt in 97 is devisive and stops assimilation. 
We already have a culture!
Now Sharia Law is being practised here.
Street signs in foreign languages ?
Britain is full and a soft touch, we the under signed do not want it!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
